description:
Are you building a business that is dependent on high net worth clients or investors?

Is your company about to embark on a crowdfunding campaign to raise investment funds?

This course will show you how to find and build rapport with investors. Not only will I show you how to find an unlimited amount of accredited investors but you will also get access to the simple tools I used to reach out to them. These are free tools and helped me raise capital for several private businesses. Mostly in the technology space but this strategy is applicable to any industry. If you are looking for oil and gas investors - perfect. If you are looking for healthcare investors - that's perfect too.

I hope you will come and join me as I share the knowledge I have gained through investment banking, private equity, venture capital and crowdfunding.

This course should open up doors for you in both your entrepreneurial journey as well as your professional career in finance.
title: Finding an Unlimited Amount of Investors
